name: FaulTV
description:
Repair TVs bringing components with you while avoiding the glasses shattered on the floor!

Use resources to fix TVs. When you need resources, order them. In 10 seconds those will be delivered right on your table. Don't run out of them or you'll lose precious time!

Created in collaboration with kalekdan

Controls

- WASD movement

- E take a resource

- Q to order a resource
